title: Looking Back at Episodes 600-700
subtitle: A sleepy stroll down mismemory lane.

title: Brothers - Sleepy Star Trek TNG S4 E3
subtitle: Always wanted some more Data? Like a emo chip off the old block, Lore will handle it for you.

title: Processing Boredom | Stan Chronicles 8
subtitle: Stan takes the mic to talk boredom and changes, soon you'll be processing zzzzzs.

title: Celebrated via a Retrospective of Episodes 500-599
subtitle: A look back at the tracks this train has covered over the past few years. Thanks for listening. Love songs for metaphors or power ballads? Calling Christopher Cross.

title: Curated Safe Place - All Intros
subtitle: This episode will Rapp around and around as you swill away like my ideas for a pair of meanderwear.

title: My Pillows Are Comforted By The Realization That I'm OK | Tingler Crossover
subtitle: Set sail for something as soothing as a tall glass of chocolate milk. A sleepy remix reading of a story by Dr. Chuck Tingle "Puffed in My Pillows by the Living Manifestation That I'm Okay and Everything is Alright”.

title: Allegiance | Snooze to Star Trek Next Generation
subtitle: Dine by candlelight, tonight with Jean Luc, you'll be confused, but you can rest as he is working out all the puzzles.

title: Cloudy Hide and Seek - Stan Chronicles Ep 7
subtitle: After smelling baked goods Scooter and Stan search for a cloud puppy. You'll drift off like a vapor.

title: Fun Food, Fun Houses at The Great New York State Fair
subtitle: Sleep will be the attraction as I take a look at all the fun and food around the fair. Since I can make it this year, my lulling imagination will have to take me there.

title: Troi's In Charge | Sleepy Star Trek TNG
subtitle: You’ll be sleeping like brother John by the end of this episode, where Counselor Troi takes command and Picard hangs with the winners of the science fair.

title: Commander's Craft Fair | Stan Chronicles Ep 6
subtitle: Paraphrasing Kermit is about as easy being green, but sleep should come as easy as Lionel’s Sunday morning.

title: As Fair as a State Fair
subtitle: Some musings about butter sculptures, history and a roller coaster called love.

title: Michael's Gambit | Good Place to Sleep Ep13
subtitle: Close you eyes as we close out the season, as you turn on the night-light, a lightbulb will go off for Eleanor, goodnight.

title: Promfree | Stan Chronicles Ep 5
subtitle: Put on your dancing shoes and hang your streams for a night under the stars. Attend a dream prom where you don’t need a date, just joy.

title: Mars, Moranis & Curry Seltzer - Pitching Roman
subtitle: Like the sweet sounds of melodious butter, this story should melt comfortable in your sleepy ears.

title: Mothership Connection with Carole King
subtitle: Slip into a neon ship as Carole King takes the funk out of bedtime.

title: The Good Place to Sleep 11/12
subtitle: Drift off as our intro reclaims bog sand and Eleanor holds doors to enable your snores.

title: Letter to a Younger Soda Machine Self | Stan Chronicles #4
subtitle: We find out the origin of Stan’s name and it is full of numerals, running on and on like the sweet humming at the back of the fridge that keeps your dreams cool…as cool as the James Dean of soda machines.

title: Cloud Tower
subtitle: Tonight’s story will have you dancing across the sky like the cream inside some breaking clouds. A  tower watches the traffic to a magical place with mud bogs and Rudolph.

title: The Good Place to Sleep 9/10
subtitle: Soft Serve vs Frozen Yogurt vs Ice Cream will be the swirls that ladle the cream into your dream.

title: Smelling Space | Nuns in Space The Stan Chronicles Ep 3
subtitle: Stan and Scooter have to deal with a mac and cheesy situation full of spaghetti ohs!

title: More Pillows Than a Fancy Hotel | All Intros
subtitle: For the summer holiday we parade around in circles with a collection of intros from the show.

title: Totes Bernie the Butterfly
subtitle: Bernie the Butterfly returns to the show to talk tote bags and “5 Seconds of Summer”.

title: The Good Place to Sleep 7/8
subtitle: Fancy boots are made for sleep and that's just what you'll do!

title: Artist's Journey | Stan Chronicles #2
subtitle: Scooter and Stan make the most of their situation, with an artist’s journey right into the jaws of love.

title: The Lemonade Experience
subtitle: A perfect view, with the perfect drink, made for relaxing whether it is country time or bedtime.

title: The Good Place to Sleep Episodes 5/6
subtitle: Like the wild horses this should carry you away, with a smile on your face.

title: The Stan Chronicles Ep 1 | Nuns in Space Season 2
subtitle: Where better to be waiting than in a cloud with your best friend.

title: Ray's Pirates of the Caribbean
subtitle: A slow meandering boat ride with a moment by moment, meandering analysis of two theme park attractions with the same name by a man who loves both.

title: Tahani and Jason | The Good Place to Sleep Ep 3/4
subtitle: Look around at all the dreamy details in the good place.

title: Themepark Series Revue
subtitle: Where do the bedtime stories that put you to sleep come from and how are they formed?

title: Alice Isn't At Brunch - "Alice" Season One Realtime Recap
subtitle: Help plan a dreamy brunch where we map out season one of “Alice Isn’t Dead” and fold it into every dish.

title: Bell Biv D'Bib | All Intros
subtitle: Scooty, scoots is back again, doing his lulling thing. All intros will go around, bed time com-for-ting.

title: The Good Place to Sleep - Episodes 1 & 2
subtitle: Tonight's sleep will be as heavenly as sweet swirls of fro-yo, flavored with with box-tie dreams.

title: Caretakers Carousel | Theme Park Finale
subtitle: Let this last episode go around and around like a carosuel that progresses through your dreams and into hers.

title: Skywriter | Trending Tuesday
subtitle: Painting with clouds is never easy, so its the perfect time for Scooter to get on the CB and get to the bottom of why the sky is not full of more writing.

title: Parting of the Ways | Sleepin' With Dr. Who
subtitle: Time to say goodnight and goodbye, let the heart of the Tardis warm you as you rest. No worries, new friends await.

title: Jungle River Journey - Theme Park
subtitle: A sustaining journey goes around and around, meandering like a canoe ride.

title: Friends of Sonic and Mario
subtitle: Don’t worry about hanging on or racing carts, if sleeping were an Olympic event you would get a gold medal.

title: Bad Wolf | Sleepin' With Doctor Who
subtitle: Game shows float in space while reality is on hold. The Doctor, Jack and Rose will play across your dreams.

title: Heart of Candy Ban
subtitle: Forbidden love of candy hearts come full circle, like drifting in a canoe with a lolipop.

title: Central Park Regret
subtitle: Not a Paul Simon song, but an episode based off a Phish set, if none of this makes sense don’t worry, in this episode even forgotten dreams come true.

title: Boom Town | Sleepin' With Doctor Who
subtitle: Sync your cell phones while we brunch in Cardiff, Captian Jack’s wit will put a heart of the Tardis level smile on your face.

title: Toy Town
subtitle: Welcome to a world of toys, made cozy with cats, be on the lookout for relaxation.

title: Rom Com Con
subtitle: Scooter tries to write a Rom-Com about notifications and ends up starting a convention that already exists.

title: Doctor Dances | Sleepin' With Doctor Who
subtitle: Would you dance with the Doctor as you dream? Just don’t snore and dance at the same time.

title: Fan of a Fan
subtitle: A seminar about the power of Fandom by the team that brought you "Bore to Win" and the "Seven Stages of Banter". Sleep should come first closely followed by health, wealth and happiness.

title: Conservatory of Reading
subtitle: Dream of a lush place where plants get bedtime stories as the bud and bloom.

title: Fairytale Gloom Game Unboxing
subtitle: You’ll be bored to sleep as I unbox this card game. Your dreams will unwrap like silent cellophane around clear cards.

title: Empty Snore Child
subtitle: Sympathetic snore rolls across London, Rose has a Union Jack and the Doctor sits for dinner, all as you sleep.

title: Panda Force
subtitle: You don’t have to be perfect to deserve a good night’s sleep, or to join the Panda Force.

title: Recipe Under Pressure in Real Time
subtitle: Let the pressure from your day become a warm sleepy steam.

title: Father's Day
subtitle: Rose takes on the past, Marty McFly style. The podcast will provide a safe place of cozy cover as birds fly in the sky.

title: Curly Sue Rush
subtitle: Your attention will be diverted by our heroines, powered by steam and gold for good.

title: Matter, Matters
subtitle: Thanks to some listener feedback, I sit down to learn more about matter. What matters? Creating your sleepy safe place.

title: Long Game
subtitle: A Pillowy Pegg will be just frosty enough to amuse you off to dreamland.

title: Oceans
subtitle: Relaxing meanders across a sleepy seascape set the stage for sleep.

title: Labelmaker
subtitle: Carol King leads me on an adventure to reclaim labels, and a little heart.

title: Comic Dalek
subtitle: Good sleep is no joke, but sometimes all you can laugh at the silly Daleks and their attempts to eliminate comic books from our world. Rest easy, Rose and The Doctor are on it.

title: Glidin' Over Comfort
subtitle: Fasten your sleepbelts and unwaken on a glide, that turns into a ride to comfort. (episode about 13:43)   Tonight’s episode is sponsored by Casper! For a limited time, visit Casper.com/savings and receive up to $200 off your purchase...

title: Weathered Weathervane
subtitle: Take me home, to bed, down some country roads, on a ride with Scoots on a search for the elusive Mountain Mama’s. Don’t forget to make the toast of it. (story at 16:39)

title: Once, Twice, Thrice a Doctor
subtitle: This house will be safe and full of meanders, you’ll sleep as the Doctor narrows it downs.

title: Dark Side of the Pretzel
subtitle: Twist and turn to the dark side of the moon.

title: Food Pilgrimager
subtitle: A fearlessly dull look at the Fall and Winter Fearless Flyers from Trader Joe’s. (Flyer talk at 16:30)

title: Aliens of London | Sleepin' With Doctor Who
subtitle: Rose comes home for a visit and things get interesting enough to sleep too.

title: Fairy Tale River Ride
subtitle: Our new series starts off on a winding, slow moving river. It meanders from there. (story at 13:34)

title: Pitching Curry and Moranis on Hall and Oats
subtitle: Bedtime is a time to talk musicals not sing them, or in this case pitch them.

title: I Feel Fine | Sleepin' With Dr. Who
subtitle: Sleeping with Dr. Who and Rose and they watch the sun do more than set.

title: Lentils and Plastic Toys
subtitle: Cuddle up with your pillow as I take a hazy look back at our last two series, what inspired them and how they came together.   Commission a Song from Jonathan Mann @ song.jonathanmann.net   Check out the interview I did on “The Dots”...

title: Genny the Username Generator
subtitle: Ever wonder what the life of a username generator is like? Good, then you can just sleep through this. (sto

title: Rose | Sleepin' With Doctor Who S1E1
subtitle: If Chris Angel were a sleep guru this episode of Dr. Who would be the misdirection that carries you off to dreamland. If Chris Angel were a sleep guru this episode of Dr. Who would be the misdirection that carries you off to dreamland. (Who talk at...

title: Stow Lake
subtitle: A peaceful ride around Stow Lake in Golden Gate Park in San Francisco.

title: Peeping Leaves
subtitle: This was an episode we did for Spoke, where I talk about peeping Autumn's leaves. Drift back a few months to the bright, bold, colors as they warm your dreams. Tonight’s episode is brought to you by Hello Fresh - the meal kit delivery service that...

title: North Pole Coco Square Dance | As The North Pole Turns Finale
subtitle: Bespoke baubles or plastic production, which way will the North Pole turn?

title: The Elf Nobody Knew Takes a Holiday Adventure Sabbatical
subtitle: A tree and an elf take a healing walk across a snowy landscape. Snow flurries, I’ve had a few.

title: Christmas Vacation | Tale of the Tape
subtitle: It will be a long winding journey down that holiday memory road with Clark and his family.

title: Mellowrama | As The North Pole Turns
subtitle: Steam plows your sleep blues away, while snow melts like Scoot's common sense. (story at about 19:49)

title: Happy Pucks | Macy's Parade Recap
subtitle: Join Ray, Tommen, Mikey, The Gregger and Bernie the Butterfly for a recap of the parade. (story at about 18:34)

title: Dickens and Dr. Who
subtitle: Take a TARDIS ride with Scoots all the way to Cardiff.

title: Stormy Sheep | As the North Pole Turns
subtitle: As The North Pole Turns…returns for another night full of mellowriffic mellorama for you to rest too.

title: Holiday Knocks with Dan and Muskie
subtitle: Dan Harmon and Elon Musk solve the world’s problems while Scooter and his dog listen to knocks.

title: Scrooged | Tale of the Tape
subtitle: After tissues go off topic, Scoots looks back into the fragmented memories he has of “Scrooged” starring Bill Murray.

title: As The North Pole Turns
subtitle: A new series, a bit like a soap opera, unfolds against the backdrop of the North Pole in the 1950’s. More of a mellowrama than a melodrama.

title: Snow Sledding
subtitle: A walk up a snowy hill from the bus stop and then a ride down the slopes. (story at about 17:45)

title: Home Alone | Tale of the Tape
subtitle: Will Scoots remember Kevin’s name or will he just ramble about Macaulay Culkin and Ryan Gosling memeing shirts? Either way you’ll be able to drift off to dreamland.

title: Apple at my Core
subtitle: Hop in my apple cart and meet my favorite New York State apple.

title: Choose Your Pun | Star Trek Sleep Discovery
subtitle: Lorca sees the light as you cross over to dreamland. PJs will be worn as Heimlich heads into the stars.

title: Teaching Valuations | After The Glass Slipper Season Finale
subtitle: Agatha answers student questions as she reviews the evaluations of her class.

title: Clouds Heal
subtitle: Drift to sleep as I learn about clouds for the first time. A healing journey with my imaginary friend Bill.

title: When Doves and Lambs Fly Together - Star Trek Sleep Discovery
subtitle: My notes will be the source of your sleep, as my memories don’t go deep. (Trek talk about 18:33)   Thanks to all the listeners who give “value for value” by becoming patrons on Patreon @ http://www.sleepwithmepodcast.com/patron  ...

title: Don't Look Back | After The Glass Slipper
subtitle: Shelly looks back at her favorite myth, one lovely enough to sleep to. (story at 20:38)

title: Talkin' Bogs
subtitle: Commune with me, as I communicate with nature, naturally you’ll fall asleep.

title: Context for Kings | Star Trek Sleep Discovery
subtitle: You dulls are discovered as I try and uncover the sleep stuff on the new Star Trek show.

title: Quilting Clues | After The Glass Slipper
subtitle: This episode folds back and forth like a rhyme by MC Escher. Agatha makes a breakthrough with a surreal quilt about a dancing mole that turns out to be a real message. (starts about 18:20)

title: Costume Nostalgia?
subtitle: Kissed by a nuclear pillow and give the power to lull you off to dreamland, Scooter meanders through the K-mart aisles and middle school dances in his mind.

title: A Fistful of Datas | Sleep With TNG
subtitle: The ancient west is the setting for a father, son and Troi adventure. But it will be Geordi’s burgeoning beard you dream of. (Trek talk at about 17:10)

title: Castles and Compromise | After The Glass Slipper
subtitle: Tonight your rest will be measured in snores.

title: Hamlet with Brainbots
subtitle: To CELEBRATE crossing 4 years and 600 episodes...A discussion with my brainiest about attending a performance of Hamlet.

title: Yesterday's Enterprise | Sleep With TNG
subtitle: Gonna go back in time for this bedtime story, all the way back to a time when prune juice was a cool drink.

title: Pop Quiz | After The Glass Slipper
subtitle: Have you ever listened to someone take a test? It will be as sleepy as you imagined.

title: Summer Fearless Flyer Review
subtitle: Look back at the lazy summer ways with fondness for snacks in a sleepy daze. (Story at about 20:47)

title: What is Sleep With Me Podcast?
subtitle: Sleep With Me is a silly bedtime story podcast for grownups. To take your mind off of whatever is keeping you awake.

title: Little One and Mother | Sleep With TNG
subtitle: Counselor Troi gets a visit from mother and Data rambles on like a sleep podcaster tucking you in like a little one.

title: Statue Love | After The Glass Slipper
subtitle: This marble will be warm to the touch while your pillow stays the perfect cool.

title: Seven Stages of Banter
subtitle: Basic banter brings you the alliterative friday feelings for sleep all week long.

title: The Chase | Sleep With Star Trek The Next Generation
subtitle: Like a pillow full of downy feathers, this goose chase goes around in helixes, swirling you off to dreamland.

title: Dueling Butterflies | After The Glass Slipper
subtitle: Don't worry Hamilton fans no Burrs will be harmed in this podcast episode, only lulls will be cast by caring siblings, for you to sleep to.

title: Trending Transcript | Lady Witchbeard Edition
subtitle: Sheep class delivery is how the lulls come tonight.

title: Qpid | Sleep With TNG
subtitle: Get tucked in with a merry Worf, as Picard exchanges dreamy looks and Q continues to amuse.

title: Magic Frog Song | After The Glass Slipper
subtitle: When this frog sings people find comfort, and a little boy finds the upper hand with his stepmother.

title: On Summer's Horseback
subtitle: Rest easy, and take a sleepy ride as I have a ride on the back on of a nice horse named Summer.

title: The Naked Now | Sleep With TNG
subtitle: Get comfortable as things get weird on the Enterprise.

title: Mother of all Alchemy | After the Glass Slipper
subtitle: Two children get a taste of weird science in order to reorder their tale of woe.

title: Things I Might Have Wrote as a Kid
subtitle: After a trip to metaphor court, I try to recall things I wrote as a kid, but really just end up talking about that mistake I made at computer camp.

title: Captain's Holiday | Sleep With Star Trek The Next Generation
subtitle: Just another lonely holiday on Risa, until a heroine stirs more than a sense of adventure in Jean Luc Picard.

title: Girl Without Birdsong | After The Glass Slipper
subtitle: Covered in a summer cloak, comes a tale without sweet smell or songs or colors, just enough blurred detail to escort you to dreamland.

title: Kayak Cruze
subtitle: An ambient ride on the Salmon River, more of a sitting around observing than a ride really.

title: Unpacking Season 7 - Game of Thrones Drones
subtitle: Join our pack as we look back, you’ll be as sung as a bug in a sleepy sack. (Got Talk 21:09)

title: Daymog and Jee'leed | After The Glass Slipper
subtitle: Friendship blooms with goats and stubborn gods to set the mood for sweet sleep.
